alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 6:27PM EDT until July 30 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 627 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Quitman, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Remerton, Dasher, Twin Lakes, Cherry Lake, Pinetta, Valdosta Regional Airport, Kinderlou, I-75 At Exit 5, Lovett, Nankin, Empress, Clyattville, Blue Springs, Hanson, I-75 At Exit 22 and I-75 At Exit 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
